hero.title: ELECTRONIC ENGINEER & FULL STACK DEVELOPER
hero.text: Specialized in the development of modern web applications and embedded systems, I offer comprehensive solutions that combine technological innovation with functional and elegant interfaces.

about.title: About Me
about.text1: I am an Electronic Engineer with a deep passion for technology and software development. With a solid background in designing and implementing cutting-edge technological solutions, I merge my expertise in electronics with advanced full-stack development skills to deliver robust, innovative, and efficient applications.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Do you have a project in mind? Let's talk!
